description: I haven´t seen such a happy and easy going guy for a long time. At least not at my office. He looked kind of like a hippie, except that he wanted a job. He mentioned a few interesting sports as his hobbies, which made me very curious. Just to test his shyness, I asked him to show me his abs. He did it, no shyness at all. From that point it was quite easy. Obviously, he couldn´t afford our mediation fee so we had to make another arrangement. I´m pretty sure the boy was straight, at least until this interview. He shook off the remaining shyness and became a real devil. He was like a horny teenager! He sucked and jerked me so hard I had a problem to last long enough to give him a good ride. This was one of the most intensive job interviews I have ever conducted.
title: Dirty Scout 98
